name: Central bedroom in Berlin Mitte next to TV tower
summary: Very central flat located in the heart of Berlin Mitte, nächst to the underground station Weinmeisterstraße and to the touristic spot of Hackescher Markt. There are many bars, restaurants, designer shops in the area as well as the TV-tower you can see through the window. You are very welcome in our nice, sunny flat.

name: Charlottenburg - Casa Zona Popular
summary: The beautifully furnished apartment is located in a very central and convenient location in the center of Berlin's Charlottenburg district. It boasts free internet access, flat-screen TV and a surround sound system. A cosy bedroom comfortable sleeps
